name: Intro
_source: speak;Simon;It really is in miserable condition...
speak;Kajal;It's the fate of all the noble houses, so they say.
speak;Simon;You don't sound like you believe it.
speak;Kajal;You might call it blasphemy, but I just can't believe that the noble houses are doomed.
speak;Kajal;With enough strength can cunning, you can wrest control from fate.
speak;Simon;But he still died, didn't he?
speak;Kajal;Not quite. He managed to stay alive in an act of defiance.
speak;Kajal;But perhaps death would have been kinder.
speak;Vincent;Sorry interrupt, but it looks like we've got company.
speak;Kajal;Bandits? This far into the swamp?
speak;Kajal;They've gotten bolder. Or more foolish.
